ofx:section.ofx:title: Views and Actions
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Every view is assigned to a single category to allow for a better overview. Choose a category and select the view you want to edit. The entries (Name/Description) on the right side are the editable items of the current selected view. Every linked action is provided by the developers and not editable by the \product\ system administrator. If you want to save your current changes, press the save button on the upper right side. Every change takes effect after the edited user logs into the system again.
